hero.title: Empowering Communities Through HIV Education
hero.subtitle: We Need We is a community-focused nonprofit dedicated to promoting HIV awareness, providing support services, and creating safe spaces for education and empowerment.

mission.title: Our Mission & Values
mission.description: We are committed to raising awareness about HIV, reducing stigma, and providing resources for those affected by HIV/AIDS.

values.title: Support
values.description: We provide emotional and educational support for individuals and communities affected by HIV.

values.title: Education
values.description: We believe in the power of knowledge to prevent new HIV infections and combat stigma.

values.title: Advocacy
values.description: We advocate for policies that protect the rights and dignity of those living with HIV.

impact.title: Our Impact
impact.description: Since 2018, we've been making a difference in communities across the country. Our programs have reached thousands of individuals, providing educational resources, testing services, and emotional support.

highlights.title: Testing & Prevention
highlights.description: Facilitated over 2,500 HIV tests and distributed prevention resources.

highlights.title: Education & Awareness
highlights.description: Conducted 150+ workshops in schools, community centers, and healthcare facilities.

highlights.title: Support Groups
highlights.description: Established 12 support groups providing ongoing assistance to those affected by HIV.

cta.title: Be Part of Our Mission
cta.description: Whether you want to volunteer, donate, or simply learn more, there are many ways to support our mission of HIV awareness and education.

hero.title: BW-SELF Advocacy Program
hero.subtitle: Empowering Black Women through Self-Advocacy, Education, and Leadership

about.title: About the Program
about.description: The BW-SELF (Black Women - Self Empowerment Leadership Framework) Advocacy program empowers Black Women to navigate healthcare systems, pursue education, and access community resources.

features.title: Self-Advocacy Skills
features.description: Developing skills to effectively communicate needs and concerns in healthcare settings.

features.title: Healthcare Navigation
features.description: Learning to navigate complex healthcare systems and access appropriate care.

features.title: Education Support
features.description: Resources and mentorship for educational advancement and career development.

features.title: Community Resources
features.description: Connecting with community resources and support networks.

testimonials.quote: This program gave me the confidence to speak up for myself in healthcare settings.
testimonials.author: Program Participant

cta.title: Join the Program
cta.description: If you're interested in joining the BW-SELF Advocacy Program, please contact us for more information.

hero.title: Just The Facts
hero.subtitle: Evidence-based information about HIV/AIDS, prevention, and treatment

facts.title: HIV Prevention
facts.description: Information about prevention methods including PrEP, PEP, and safer sex practices.

facts.title: Testing
facts.description: Resources for HIV testing, including free and confidential options.

facts.title: Treatment
facts.description: Information about antiretroviral therapy and other treatment options.

facts.title: Living with HIV
facts.description: Resources and support for those living with HIV.

hero.title: Educational Webinars
hero.subtitle: Expanding knowledge through online learning opportunities

upcoming.title: HIV Prevention Updates
upcoming.description: Learn about the latest advances in HIV prevention.

upcoming.title: Self-Advocacy in Healthcare
upcoming.description: Strategies for effective communication with healthcare providers.

past.title: Understanding HIV Treatment
past.description: An overview of current HIV treatment options.

hero.title: Support Our Cause
hero.subtitle: Your donation helps us continue our mission of HIV awareness and education

items.description: Provides educational materials for one person
Supports one person attending a workshop
Helps provide HIV testing for 5 people

hero.title: SheStories Blog
hero.subtitle: Personal stories, insights, and experiences shared by our community

featured.title: My Journey to Health Advocacy
featured.excerpt: A personal story of how I found my voice in healthcare settings and became an advocate for myself and others.
featured.author: Community Member

featured.title: Finding Community in Health Challenges
featured.excerpt: How connecting with others facing similar health issues can provide support, resources, and empowerment.
featured.author: Community Member
